title: SPINACH-TOMATO-FETA CHEESE STUFFED CHICKEN BREAST WITH BROWN RICE
directions: Slice the thick chicken breast down the middle to make it look like a butterfly; careful not to slice all the way through the chicken breast.
Season the chicken breast with your choice of seasonings.
Open the chicken breast and on one side, and add the following layers: spinach, tomato slices and then feta cheese.
Fold the chicken breast like a sandwich and use toothpicks to hold the chicken breast in place so that it bakes closed.
Bake for 18 – 20 minutes or until the chicken breast is completely cooked.
Cook brown rice and add garlic and diced onion for extra flavor.
